content.prompt: In context, the statement “Yes, novels” (third sentence) does all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: introduce a commentary about a practice common to writers of fiction
mark a shift from third-person to first-person narration
imply that the previous sentence may contain surprising information
suggest that an earlier observation is inaccurate

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
